contractId.name: contractId
contractId.description: The contract ID of the contract on which the order item addition is based.

partNumber.name: partNumber
partNumber.description: The reference number that identifies the external part number of the catalog.

com.ibm.commerce.rest.order.handler.Cart.description: Description of the ApplePayUpdate input body.

x_calculationUsage.name: x_calculationUsage
x_calculationUsage.description: The identifier for the type of calculation to be performed on the order.

com.ibm.commerce.rest.order.handler.Cart.description: Body of request input for calculateOrder.

outOrderName.name: outOrderName
outOrderName.description: Specifies the names of name-value pairs to be passed to a JSP. The value of eachadded name-value pair is the reference number of the order to be displayed. If the name is not provided, the default name orderId is used. This parameter can be repeated.

calculationUsageId.name: calculationUsageId
calculationUsageId.description: Gives predefined codes for calculation of discounts (-1), shipping (-2), sales tax (-3), shipping tax (-4), coupons (-5), surcharge (-6) and shipping adjustment (-7)

updatePrices.name: updatePrices
updatePrices.description: Flag to indicate whether the price of order item will be refreshed in this command. if the flag is "1", price will be updated. others will not.

doFreeGift.name: doFreeGift
doFreeGift.description: Specifies whether the command should perform the free gift handling logic. Set to enable free gift handling, or not to handle free gifts when not required for order recalculation (N). The default value is (Y).

doPrice.name: doPrice
doPrice.description: Specifies whether the command should perform the price calculation subtasks. Set to enable the price tasks (Y), or to disable price tasks (N).

orderId.name: orderId
orderId.description: The id of the order to which the reward option record is associated with.

rewardOptionId.name: rewardOptionId
rewardOptionId.description: The id of the reward option record to which the reward choice information needs to be updated

com.ibm.commerce.rest.order.handler.Cart.description: Description of the addOrderItem input body.

x_inventoryValidation.name: x_inventoryValidation
x_inventoryValidation.description: Specifies whether inventory status should be validated for adding to cart.

x_calculationUsage.name: x_calculationUsage
x_calculationUsage.description: The identifier for the type of calculation to be performed on the order.

x_calculateOrder.name: x_calculateOrder
x_calculateOrder.description: Specifies whether OrderCalculateCmd will be called to calculate the charges for the order. 0 = do not call OrderCalculateCmd, 1 = call OrderCalculateCmd.

outOrderName.name: outOrderName
outOrderName.description: The reference number of a destination order.

orderId.name: orderId
orderId.description: Specifies an order using the order reference number or one of the Order abbreviations. If the parameter is omitted, all the pending orders will be set to current. If a specified pending order no longer exists, it is not set to current.

Empty.description: Empty model. Used as default value when no model is specified.

outOrderName.name: outOrderName
outOrderName.description: The reference number of a destination order.

com.ibm.commerce.rest.order.handler.Cart.description: Structure containing an order ID and order item ID.

orderItemId.name: orderItemId
orderItemId.description: The ID of the order item to be updated.

x_calculateOrder.name: x_calculateOrder
x_calculateOrder.description: Specifies whether OrderCalculateCmd will be called to calculate the charges for the order. 0 = do not call OrderCalculateCmd, 1 = call OrderCalculateCmd.

doInventory.name: doInventory
doInventory.description: Specifies whether the command should perform the inventory calculation subtasks. Set to either do the price tasks (Y), or not (N). Turning off these tasks might result in better performance, but customers might not get the most current inventory level, when changes occur.

calculateOrder.name: calculateOrder
calculateOrder.description: Specifies whether OrderCalculateCmd will be called to calculate the charges for the order. 0 = do not call OrderCalculateCmd, 1 = call OrderCalculateCmd.

quantity.name: quantity
quantity.description: The quantity of the item to be added to the order.

orderItemId.name: orderItemId
orderItemId.description: The identifier of the OrderItem to be updated.

fulfillmentCenterId.name: fulfillmentCenterId
fulfillmentCenterId.description: The identifier of the fulfillment center that this item belongs to.

ConfigXML.name: ConfigXML
ConfigXML.description: The configuration XML of the dynamic kit to be added

shipModeId.name: shipModeId
shipModeId.description: The identifier associated with a particular shipping service.

calculationUsage.name: calculationUsage
calculationUsage.description: The identifier for the type of calculation to be performed on the order.

remerge.name: remerge
remerge.description: A list of the OrderItems that should be merged with other OrderItems in the same order and with the same correlationGroup attribute, if possible. OrderItems are not merged unless their InventoryStatus is "NALC", or they are specified by one or more of the allocate, backorder, and reverse parameters.

doPrice.name: doPrice
doPrice.description: Specifies whether the command should perform the price calculation subtasks. Set to enable the price tasks (Y), or to disable price tasks (N).

check.name: check
check.description: A list of OrderItems that should be checked by the CheckInventoryAvailability task command.

reverse.name: reverse
reverse.description: A list of OrderItems whose allocations should be released (that is, de-allocated from existing or expected inventory as appropriate).

catEntryId.name: catEntryId
catEntryId.description: The identifier of a catalog entry to be used to create a new OrderItem.

addressId.name: addressId
addressId.description: The reference number of the shipping mode to be used for the product or item.

UOM.name: UOM
UOM.description: The unit of measure for quantity.

backorder.name: backorder
backorder.description: A list of OrderItems that should be allocated from expected inventory if they are not allocated from existing inventory.

allocate.name: allocate
allocate.description: A list of OrderItems that should be allocated from existing inventory.

merge.name: merge
merge.description: A list of OrderItems that should be merged with other OrderItems in the same order if possible, regardless of their correlationGroup attributes.

contractId.name: contractId
contractId.description: The identifier of the contract associated with the order.

physicalStoreId.name: physicalStoreId
physicalStoreId.description: A comment to be included with the created or updated order items.

partNumber.name: partNumber
partNumber.description: The part number of catalog entry.

comment.name: comment
comment.description: The identifier of the address to which the products and items are shipped.

inventoryValidation.name: inventoryValidation
inventoryValidation.description: Specifies whether inventory status should be validated for adding to cart.

prepare.name: prepare
prepare.description: Whether to prepare the order by calling the PrepareOrder command.

partOwnerId.name: partOwnerId
partOwnerId.description: The member ID of the part owner, used with partNumber.

addressId.name: addressId
addressId.description: The reference number of the address to which the order items are to be shipped.

correlationGroup.name: correlationGroup
correlationGroup.description: The group to which this order item is related.

copyAutoAddedOrderItems.name: copyAutoAddedOrderItems
copyAutoAddedOrderItems.description: Whether to copy auto-added order items.

copyOrderItemId.name: copyOrderItemId
copyOrderItemId.description: Specifies which order items should be copied from the source orders specified by fromOrderId and added to the destination order specified by toOrderId.

continue.name: continue
continue.description: Controls whether the order copy continues when one or more of the order items cannot be copied. A value of 0 terminates and rolls back execution if an order item cannot be created or updated in the target order. A value of 1 ignores the create or update operation for that order item and continues execution. The default value is 0.

price.name: price
price.description: The price of the order items.

merge.name: merge
merge.description: List of order items that is to be merged with other order items in the same order if possible, regardless of their correlationGroup attributes.

billingAddressId.name: billingAddressId
billingAddressId.description: The billing address ID of the destination order.

configurationId.name: configurationId
configurationId.description: If the order item represents a configured Dynamic Kit, this is the configuration ID

inventoryValidation.name: inventoryValidation
inventoryValidation.description: Whether inventory status should be validated for adding to cart.

outOrderItemName.name: outOrderItemName
outOrderItemName.description: The reference number of a destination order item.

memberId.name: memberId
memberId.description: The reference number of a member, used to resolve special order abbreviations when they appear in fromOrderId.

outOrderName.name: outOrderName
outOrderName.description: The reference number of a destination order.

requestedShipDate.name: requestedShipDate
requestedShipDate.description: The date which the destination order should be shipped.

copyOrderUniquePromotionCode.name: copyOrderUniquePromotionCode
copyOrderUniquePromotionCode.description: Whether to copy unique promotion codes applied to the order.

check.name: check
check.description: List of order items that is to be checked by the CheckInventory task command.

shipAsComplete.name: shipAsComplete
shipAsComplete.description: Specifies if the created or modified order can be partially shipped. If the value is Y, the order will be shipped when all order items are available. If the value is N, the order can be partially shipped when some of the order items are available.

backorder.name: backorder
backorder.description: List of order items that is to be allocated from expected inventory.

allocate.name: allocate
allocate.description: List of order items that is to be allocated from existing inventory.

offerId.name: offerId
offerId.description: List of offer IDs to be chosen from when creating a new order item.

status.name: status
status.description: The status of the destination order.

displaySeq.name: displaySeq
displaySeq.description: The display sequence of the destination order.

blockInfoCopy.name: blockInfoCopy
blockInfoCopy.description: Whether the orderblock objects will be copied.

orderInfoFrom.name: orderInfoFrom
orderInfoFrom.description: The reference number of an order from which to copy order-level information.

description.name: description
description.description: The description of the destination order

catEntryId.name: catEntryId
catEntryId.description: The catalog entry ID of the order item.

copyOrderPromotionCode.name: copyOrderPromotionCode
copyOrderPromotionCode.description: Whether to copy public promotion codes applied to the order.

updateOrderItemId.name: updateOrderItemId
updateOrderItemId.description: Specifies order items in the destination order to be updated. It is updated using information from other parameters in the enumeration group specified by i, but not from the source orders for that enumeration group and not from catEntryId and partNumber. Note that the catalog entry ID of an order item cannot be updated.

fromOrderId.name: fromOrderId
fromOrderId.description: Specifies zero or more source orders from which order items will be copied.

currency.name: currency
currency.description: The currency of the order items.

tcId.name: tcId
tcId.description: The term and condition ID of the destination order.

shippingAddressFromOrderProfile.name: shippingAddressFromOrderProfile
shippingAddressFromOrderProfile.description: Whether to use the default shipping address held in the order profile: if the value is 1, the default shipping address is copied from the order profile to all the order items of the order specified in toOrderId.

quantity.name: quantity
quantity.description: The quantity of the order item.

toOrderId.name: toOrderId
toOrderId.description: Specifies the order to be created or modified.

pay_paymentname.name: pay_paymentname
pay_paymentname.description: (Deprecated) This is supported for compatibility with earlier versions. With payment rule, ORDPAYINFO is not used, while using payment plugin controller and payment plugins. Sets the payment name-value pairs of the destination order.

payInfoFrom.name: payInfoFrom
payInfoFrom.description: The reference number of an order from which to obtain payment information. If more than one order is specified, only the most recently updated of those orders applies.

copyOrdPayInfo.name: copyOrdPayInfo
copyOrdPayInfo.description: Whether to copy order payment information.

remerge.name: remerge
remerge.description: List of the order items that are to be merged with other order items in the same order and with the same correlationGroup attribute, if possible.

shipModeId.name: shipModeId
shipModeId.description: The reference number associated with a particular shipping service.

reverse.name: reverse
reverse.description: List of order items whose allocation is to be released.

sensitiveInfoCopy.name: sensitiveInfoCopy
sensitiveInfoCopy.description: Whether the payment methods will be copied.

field1.name: field1
field1.description: Sets the field1 value of the destination order. If not specified, the corresponding field value of the "orderInfoFrom" order will be used, if there is one.

UOM.name: UOM
UOM.description: The unit of measure for the quantity.

isPONumberCopied.name: isPONumberCopied
isPONumberCopied.description: Whether the PO number of source order will be copied to the destination order.

shippingModeFromOrderProfile.name: shippingModeFromOrderProfile
shippingModeFromOrderProfile.description: Whether to use the default shipping mode held in the order profile: if the value is 1, the default shipping mode is copied from the order profile to all the order items of the order specified in toOrderId.

contractId.name: contractId
contractId.description: The contract reference number associated with the order.

comment.name: comment
comment.description: A comment to be included with the item when order items are added to or updated in the destination order.

partNumber.name: partNumber
partNumber.description: Part number to be resolved to a catalog entry. It overrides catEntryId.

field3.name: field3
field3.description: Sets the field3 value of the destination order. If not specified, the corresponding field value of the "orderInfoFrom" order will be used, if there is one.

field2.name: field2
field2.description: Sets the field2 value of the destination order. If not specified, the corresponding field value of the "orderInfoFrom" order will be used, if there is one.

refreshContractAndOffer.name: refreshContractAndOffer
refreshContractAndOffer.description: Whether to refresh the price information for all order items.

com.ibm.commerce.rest.order.handler.Cart.description: Request body input for shopping cart submission for checkout.

notifyMerchant.name: notifyMerchant
notifyMerchant.description: Whether the store is notified when the order processing is complete. E-mail notifications are only sent when WebSphere Commerce is configured with WebSphere Commerce Payments. 1=Yes ,0=No

SMS.name: SMS
SMS.description: Send SMS notifications to the target phone number.

notifyShopper.name: notifyShopper
notifyShopper.description: Whether the customer is notified when the order processing is complete. E-mail notifications are only sent when WebSphere Commerce is configured with WebSphere Commerce Payments. 1=Yes, 0=No

notifyOrderSubmitted.name: notifyOrderSubmitted
notifyOrderSubmitted.description: Specifies whether the customer is notified when the order is successfully submitted for processing. 1=Yes, 0=No (Default)

notify_EMailSender_recipient.name: notify_EMailSender_recipient
notify_EMailSender_recipient.description: Send order e-mail notifications to the target recipient.

inBackorder.description: List of OrderItems that should be allocated from expected inventory.

doInventory.name: doInventory
doInventory.description: Whether the inventory action will be performed.

deleteIfEmpty.name: deleteIfEmpty
deleteIfEmpty.description: Whether orders should be deleted if no OrderItems remain when the OrderItems are moved.

outBackorder.name: outBackorder
outBackorder.description: List of OrderItems that should be allocated from expected inventory.

inMerge.name: inMerge
inMerge.description: List of OrderItems that should be merged with other OrderItems in the same order if possible, regardless of their correlationGroup attributes.

toOrderId.name: toOrderId

inReverse.name: inReverse

inAllocate.description: List of OrderItems that should be allocated from existing inventory.

outAllocate.description: List of OrderItems that should be allocated from existing inventory.

fromOrderItemId.name: fromOrderItemId
fromOrderItemId.description: The input OrderItems to be moved.

createIfEmpty.name: createIfEmpty
createIfEmpty.description: The valid value of this parameter is 1 or 0. The default value is 0. If the parameter createIfEmpty is specified to 1 and there is no transferred order items, a new empty order will be created when either the toOrderId parameter is ** or the toOrderId parameter is .**. but there is no current pending order. The symbol "**" means to create new pending order; the symbol ".**." means to create new pending order if there are no pending orders currently.

moveOrderPromotionCode.name: moveOrderPromotionCode
moveOrderPromotionCode.description: Whether the promotion code will be merged into the target order.

outRemerge.name: outRemerge
outRemerge.description: List of the OrderItems that should be merged with other OrderItems in the same order and with the same correlationGroup attribute, if possible.

outReverse.name: outReverse
outReverse.description: List of OrderItems whose allocations should be released.

refreshContractAndOffer.name: refreshContractAndOffer
refreshContractAndOffer.description: Whether the price informaiton for all of the order items is refreshed.

outOrderItemName.name: outOrderItemName
outOrderItemName.description: The reference number of an output OrderItem.

outOrderName.name: outOrderName
outOrderName.description: Specifies the name-value pairs to add to the redirection URL. The values of the added name-value pairs are the reference numbers of the input orders.

calculateOrder.name: calculateOrder
calculateOrder.description: Specifies whether OrderCalculateCmd will be called to calculate the charges for the order. 0 = do not call OrderCalculateCmd, 1 = call OrderCalculateCmd.

calculationUsage.name: calculationUsage
calculationUsage.description: The identifier for the type of calculation to be performed on the order.

check.name: check
check.description: A list of order items that is to be checked by the CheckInventory task command.

catEntryId.name: catEntryId
catEntryId.description: The catalog entry ID of the item to be deleted from the order.

delay.name: delay
delay.description: The amount of time, in seconds, before order processing is retried, in case of order processing failure. This parameter must be paired with the attempts parameter.

start.name: start
start.description: The time at which the first execution of this order should occur in the format YYYY:MM:DD:hh:mm:ss. Only hh:mm:ss is mandatory.

host.name: host
host.description: Host name responsible for processing an order.

interval.name: interval
interval.description: The number of seconds between successive executions of this order.

attempts.name: attempts
attempts.description: The number of times the scheduler tries processing this order if order processing fails.

operations.summary: Gets order details for the shopping cart.

parameters.name: storeId
parameters.description: The store identifier.

parameters.name: responseFormat
parameters.description: The response format. If the request has an input body, that body must also use the format specified in "responseFormat". Valid values include "json" and "xml" without the quotes. If the responseFormat isn't specified, the "accept" HTTP header shall be used to determine the format of the response. If the "accept" HTTP header isn't specified as well, the default response format shall be in json.

parameters.name: pageNumber
parameters.description: Page number, starting at 1. Valid values include positive integers of 1 and above. The "pageSize" must be specified for paging to work.

parameters.name: pageSize
parameters.description: Page size. Used to limit the amount of data returned by a query. Valid values include positive integers of 1 and above. The "pageNumber" must be specified for paging to work.

parameters.name: currency
parameters.description: The currency code to use. Example usage : currency=USD. If no currency code is specified, the store default currency shall be used.

parameters.name: sortOrderItemBy
parameters.description: The order the results are sorted by ie:orderItemID

parameters.name: profileName
parameters.description: Profile name. Profiles determine the subset of data to be returned by a query.

description: This class provides RESTful services to add, update, delete, and get items in the shopping cart and checkout.It also provides services to get usable shipping and payment information by delegating to the Order BOD service.
